metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for data engineering, cloud workflows, and developer productivity

plugins.name: databricks-executor
plugins.description: Execute Python, SQL, Scala, or R code on Databricks clusters via the Execution Context API

plugins.name: statusline
plugins.description: Rich Claude Code status line with context usage, API rate limits, git info, and visual progress bars

plugins.name: manim-web
plugins.description: Create animated splash screens and web animations using Manim Community (3Blue1Brown's animation engine)

plugins.name: people
plugins.description: Person-directed actions: messaging (Teams, WhatsApp, iMessage, Messenger) and GitHub collaboration

plugins.name: repo-creator
plugins.description: Create repositories, publish to GitHub, and set up virtual environments with the /repo command

plugins.name: ssh-pi
plugins.description: Execute commands and develop on a Raspberry Pi via SSH

plugins.name: next-feature
plugins.description: Implement the next feature from features.json using the feature-dev agent

plugins.name: databricks
plugins.description: Comprehensive Databricks administration - SQL queries, clusters, warehouses, jobs, deployments, secrets, and monitoring across multiple workspaces
